Welcome
------

![](./d77original.png)

What is d77voidGNU/Linux? Well, it's a respin; a respin with window managers (WM).

Powered by Void GNU/Linux. **Long live to the Void**!

Built with void-mklive; all apps from Void repositories available to install.

It can be installed with the tui d77void-installer or with Calamares.

It is currently built with 7 WM:

- dwm

- fluxbox

- hyprland

- labwc

- openbox

- qtile

- sway

and 3 more experimental WM:

- awesome

- leftWM

- niri


Proudly hosted on Sourceforge.net

Download the latest from 

[![Download d77void](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/d77void/files/latest/download)


If you encounter any problem or want to make a suggestion:
